name: Intraday Crypto HMA-ADX Trend Strategy
description: An intraday trend-following strategy for liquid cryptocurrency pairs that goes long when HMA(20) crosses above HMA(50) with ADX(14) > 25 and short on the opposite crossover. Positions are sized to risk 2 % of equity, protected by a 1.5 % stop loss and a 4.5 % take-profit or an opposite crossover. The setup trades 15-minute candles on BTC/USD and ETH/USD.
